Case Study

Perc

Reimagined Perc.org with a structured Gutenberg experience and Alpine-powered filters that make research browsing effortless.

Visit live site

Challenge

What they needed

Perc.org needed a major redesign with better content organization, modern design, and easier content filtering.

Approach

How we solved it

Created a full redesign with Gutenberg blocks (core + Kadence), implemented Alpine.js filtering using the WP REST API.

Completed

November 2022

Website

https://perc.org/

Stack highlights

  • WordPress
  • Kadence
  • Alpine.js
  • REST API
  • PHP
